mapper.update:
update FEE_RATE
PARENT_PRODUCT_NO = #{parentProductNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_CODE = #{feeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HA_FEE_RATE = #{feeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_FEE_RATE = #{paFeeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RATE_UNIT = #{feeRateUint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCREASE_CREDIT_CODE = #{increaseCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSU_COMPANY = #{insuCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COP_NO = #{copNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COP_NAME = #{copName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATETIME_CREATED = #{datetimeCreated,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATETIME_UPDATED = #{datetimeUpdated,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update FEE_RATE set PARENT_PRODUCT_NO = #{parentProductNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_CODE = #{feeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HA_FEE_RATE = #{feeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_FEE_RATE = #{paFeeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RATE_UNIT = #{feeRateUint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCREASE_CREDIT_CODE = #{increaseCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSU_COMPANY = #{insuCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COP_NO = #{copNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COP_NAME = #{copName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATETIME_CREATED = #{datetimeCreated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATETIME_UPDATED = #{datetimeUpdated,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select s.enname from s_dic s where s.opttype=#{opttype} and s.cnname=#{cnName}
select s.enname from s_dic s where s.opttype=#{opttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CNNAME from CMIS.S_DIC sd where sd.OPTTYPE='STD_ZB_LOAN_USE' and sd.ENNAME=#{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select s.cnname from s_treedic s where s.opttype=#{opttype} and s.enname=#{enName}
